response.overview: When former Green Beret John Rambo is harassed by local law enforcement and arrested for vagrancy, he is forced to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.
response.tagline: This time he's fighting for his life.
response.title: First Blood

cast.name: Jack Rigg
cast.character: Bobby - The Base Camp Radio Operator (uncredited)
